scenes.description: Pokey congratulates Advent on finishing the first challenge.
Transition animation showing the Advent members with donuts.
The members gather in front of a mysterious box.
Pokey explains the rules of the second challenge.
Nerissa prepares for the challenge and puts on a blindfold.
Nerissa tries to guess the item in the box while being teased by the others.
Nerissa identifies the Kiara plush toy and shares her reaction.
Pokey challenges Bijou, who responds with a cool Japanese phrase.

subtitles.original: You did better than I expected.
subtitles.english: You did better than I expected.

subtitles.original: Well then, let's move on to the second challenge!
subtitles.english: Well then, let's move on to the second challenge!

subtitles.original: Okay, we're ready to beat the second challenge! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Okay, we're ready to beat the second challenge! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: What the beef is that?
subtitles.english: What the beef is that?

subtitles.original: It's a box!
subtitles.english: It's a box!

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: I don't like boxes.
subtitles.english: I don't like boxes.

subtitles.original: For the second challenge, I will test your courage!
subtitles.english: For the second challenge, I will test your courage!

subtitles.original: I want each one of you to cover your eyes and put your hands inside the box.
subtitles.english: I want each one of you to cover your eyes and put your hands inside the box.

subtitles.original: Then you need to guess what's in the box, just by touching it!
subtitles.english: Then you need to guess what's in the box, just by touching it!

subtitles.original: 2nd Challenge: What's in the Box Challenge
subtitles.english: 2nd Challenge: What's in the Box Challenge

subtitles.original: Okay, how about you go first, Nerissa?
subtitles.english: Okay, how about you go first, Nerissa?

subtitles.original: Ah, I mean, I guess, you know, even a child could probably play this game.
subtitles.english: Ah, I mean, I guess, you know, even a child could probably play this game.

subtitles.original: You'll be fine.
subtitles.english: You'll be fine.

subtitles.original: Ready to try, Nerissa?
subtitles.english: Ready to try, Nerissa?

subtitles.original: Alright, I'll take care of this.
subtitles.english: Alright, I'll take care of this.

subtitles.original: It might be too easy, so maybe I should put on a blindfold.
subtitles.english: It might be too easy, so maybe I should put on a blindfold.

subtitles.original: Alright, I'm ready.
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm ready.

subtitles.original: This is what's inside your box!
subtitles.english: This is what's inside your box!

subtitles.original: Kiara Plush Toy
subtitles.english: Kiara Plush Toy

subtitles.original: Alright, come on, come on, my old lady.
subtitles.english: Alright, come on, come on, my old lady.

subtitles.original: What is it? What is it?
subtitles.english: What is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: You have to touch it!
subtitles.english: You have to touch it!

subtitles.original: You have to guess within time!
subtitles.english: You have to guess within time!

subtitles.original: Is it a puppy? I don't know.
subtitles.english: Is it a puppy? I don't know.

subtitles.original: Is it a mouse? Is it a kitten?
subtitles.english: Is it a mouse? Is it a kitten?

subtitles.original: No! No! No! Meow meow!
subtitles.english: No! No! No! Meow meow!

subtitles.original: Is that your final answer?
subtitles.english: Is that your final answer?

subtitles.original: You're kind of close.
subtitles.english: You're kind of close.

subtitles.original: Is it... is it Kiara?
subtitles.english: Is it... is it Kiara?

subtitles.original: I have no idea. I don't feel...
subtitles.english: I have no idea. I don't feel...

subtitles.original: You have to touch it once!
subtitles.english: You have to touch it once!

subtitles.original: You can do it! Use both hands!
subtitles.english: You can do it! Use both hands!

subtitles.original: Is it Kiara?
subtitles.english: Is it Kiara?

subtitles.original: Remove your blindfold.
subtitles.english: Remove your blindfold.

subtitles.original: That was so stressful!
subtitles.english: That was so stressful!

subtitles.original: Kiara! It wasn't that bad.
subtitles.english: Kiara! It wasn't that bad.

subtitles.original: I have this at home! I have this at home!
subtitles.english: I have this at home! I have this at home!

subtitles.original: It followed you all the way here!
subtitles.english: It followed you all the way here!

subtitles.original: Every time I touched it, it felt like it was moving!
subtitles.english: Every time I touched it, it felt like it was moving!

subtitles.original: That wasn't so hard, right?
subtitles.english: That wasn't so hard, right?

subtitles.original: YOU! THE LITTLE ONE! You go next!
subtitles.english: YOU! THE LITTLE ONE! You go next!

subtitles.original: Hey! Who you calling little one, eh?
subtitles.english: Hey! Who you calling little one, eh?

subtitles.original: Don't underestimate the Gamer of Advent! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Don't underestimate the Gamer of Advent! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Alright, so-called "Gamer of Advent," this time it's not something cute and fluffy like Nerissa's...
subtitles.english: Alright, so-called "Gamer of Advent," this time it's not something cute and fluffy like Nerissa's...

subtitles.original: Oh, I'm ready.
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm ready.

subtitles.original: Come on, bring it!
subtitles.english: Come on, bring it!

subtitles.original: これは頭の中だけの話じゃない。Yeah!
subtitles.english: This isn't just a story in my head! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Wow, Japanese! Your Japanese is so good!
subtitles.english: Wow, Japanese! Your Japanese is so good!
